name: Town Defender (Kalponic Games)
description:
Game submitted for  Devtober.

  1. Build structures to gather resources and defend your town.
  2. Use keyboard WASD/arrow keys or mouse to navigate the map
  3. Survive as many waves as you can.
  4. Click on the gear button on the top left to access the options button and to pause the game.

🙏 If you like it, please leave a rating for the GAME. Follow me on my social media to get more games like this and if you are generous consider supporting me on Patreon which will enable me to make more games like this🙏
